modName: Larceners Lair - Riften Ratway Player Home
summary: An atmospheric, thieves guild themed player home located within the Ratways of Riften.
descriptionHtml:
Larcener\'s Lair is an atmospheric, thieves guild themed player home located within the Ratways of Riften. It\'s midsized and has every commodity a thief could possibly need. A picture is worth a thousand words, so check out the images if you\'re curious.


This damp sewer home has two entrances - one in the Ratway, and another secret entrance conveniently located in a corner near Black-Briar Manor.[i] It requires a key to enter, which can be found on Mercer Frey\'s desk in the thieves guild headquarters, \"Ragged Flagon - Cistern.\"[/i]

Pay no mind to the resident skeevers.
author: Konrann
